channel.title: PI new hit marks problem (NOT AN ERROR)
channel.description:
when i hit, hitmarks works perfectly fading, appearing, correct icons etc, but the only problem is that it hits always 1 and i don't get hits :/
resolved.. there had a code added (combos =- 1) removed it and working now
